summary: In the follow-up of Estonian classics "Kevade" (1969) and "Suvi" (1976) the same characters have reached their middle-age. Everybody are living quiet family-life but Kiir the tailor who one... See full summary »
cast: Margus Lepa|Liina Tennosaar|Anne Reemann|Kaljo Kiisk|Ita Ever|Tõnu Oja|Aare Laanemets|Riina Hein|Väino Laes|Rein Aedma|Ain Lutsepp|Tiit Lilleorg|Aarne Üksküla|Tõnu Kark|Maria Klenskaja|Arno Liiver|Jaanus Orgulas|Raivo Rüütel|Andrus Vaarik|Helene Vannari
title: Sügis
